document_data.mainbody:
Raeldar was a War Wizard of Cormyr in the late 15 century DR.
He was older than Glathra Barcantle.
When the Hall of Justice became filled with deadly smoke on the day of the Council of the Dragon in late Mirtul of the , Glathra Barcantle coordinated the effort to counter that poisonous smoke. Initially, Raeldar was skeptical of her command, as she lacked rank to command her fellows, but finally came to agree with her.
